name: Firefox App Button as Pinned Tab
description: Makes the firefox app button look as a pinned tab. With color options.
additional_info:
03-09-2013
Small fix maximized mode.

08-02-2013
Dropped support for tabs "not on top" setting since Firefox dropped the feature
Fixed issue when menubar is visible

20-06-2012
Supports tabs "not on top" for small icons setting
The original pinned tab shading used

14-06-2012
Fixed bug when opening in maximized mode

14-06-2012
Movable firefox button not needed and not compatible (if you update please disable or remove).
Added color options.

16-03-2012
Minor borderfix
Appbutton icon replaced with "start private browsing" icon from menu in private mode

13-03-2012 (Initial release)
I wanted to have the firefox app button as a pinned tab, so I created a style for it.


REQUIREMENTS
Only tested in Windows enviroment.
